name: ElonBank
description: "ElonBank is a financial protocol that includes mechanisms for auto-staking, auto-compounding, and auto-liquidity. You will receive the APY of 400,977% simply by purchasing and holding ElonBank. By maintaining a steady 0.02368% rebase rate given to all ElonBank holders every 15 minutes, the features mentioned in the whitepaper will assist ElonBank to achieve price stability and the long-term viability of the enterprise. Additionally, ElonBank mobile app will help users to track their investments easily on their mobile phones."
